TopicTitle: [Rover] 3 Wheels Cool! Morgan Three Wheeler Survey Rover

Articles.Content:
Korgan Three Wheeler

Based on the unique Morgan Three Wheeler

Download from KerbalX!

Stock Version

Survey Version with Tarsier ChemCam & DMagic Science Instruments

Consumer advisory: Camera not to be used for selfies!
cant see the images on this wifi but Im sure its awesome! Will check it out at home
Holy Kraken! There is a Curiosity style camera mod??? I must try that one!

Holy Kraken! There is a Curiosity style camera mod??? I must try that one!

Tarsier Space Technologies is great. I'm launching the space telescope next
I feel oddly attracted to the blueberry-coloured chick in the first picture but I am confused why she seems to have a toilet cistern growing out of her head.
I like it, they look like a News Broadcast Team for a Kerbin News Center!

I like it, they look like a News Broadcast Team for a Kerbin News Center!

"In other news, an experimental 3-wheeled rover has apparently gained sentience and fled to the mountains west of KSC. Hikers are advised to approach with extreme caution..."

I feel oddly attracted to the blueberry-coloured chick in the first picture but I am confused why she seems to have a toilet cistern growing out of her head.

And glowing green highlights no less!

I like it, they look like a News Broadcast Team for a Kerbin News Center!

The camera can save screenshots from its perspective! Fun idea to make use of it for news purposes.

"In other news, an experimental 3-wheeled rover has apparently gained sentience and fled to the mountains west of KSC. Hikers are advised to approach with extreme caution..."

Uh oh. Let's hope it doesn't form an alliance with CL4P-TP.
My Three-wheeler looks nowhere near as cool as yours! Although to be honest, I'm not sure how a van could ever be cool, even in space.

My Three-wheeler looks nowhere near as cool as yours! 2015-04-17_00005.jpg Although to be honest, I'm not sure how a van could ever be cool, even in space.

Looks like you're trying to post a photo from your computer onto the forums. Unfortunately you can't link to something on your hard drive; you'll have to upload it to an image-sharing service like Imgur and link to it from there so that other people can see it.

Hope this helps!
Honestly, I didn't even notice the three wheeled rover once the blue kerbal came into view. All I could think was "Holy [bleep] there's a blue kerbal in there!"
Okay, thanks for the info. Image is here:

Hey, nice 3 wheeler van! My GF thought at first I was going to build the blue van from Mr. Bean, with a similar layout as yours. I wouldn't mind to get the craft file (if stock or near stock) and tinker with it.

It looks like a wedge of cheese

As for coolness of vans...

Vans are eternally cool, just ask the KerbalWagen Type 2 Microbus, now with amphibious landing craft!

Hey, nice 3 wheeler van! My GF thought at first I was going to build the blue van from Mr. Bean

Funny you should mention that, because that's exactly what it is; a Robin Reliant.

I have already seen your van, and it looks fantastic.
